Texts.Chs: 作为一个种族，厄休安龙人已经从嗜血的游牧部落发展成为一个和平的民族，尽管最近在卡蒂尔的统治下对该物种男性的迫害已经在厄休安龙人居住的星球上引起了小规模抵抗的起义，国家通过增加在所有主要城市的军事力量进行报复。
Texts.Eng: As a race, the Eld'uukhar have developed from bloodthirsty nomadic tribes into a peaceful people, although the recent persecution of males of the species under Ka'tir's rule has brought about the uprising of little pockets of resistance on Eld'uukhar inhabited planets, and the state has retaliated by increasing military presence in all major cities.
